subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Making a spot start to allow Matt Harvey, Jacob deGrom and Bartolo Colon to rest, Montero, once considered a top prospect, gave up three runs in five and two-thirds innings.
snippet: Making a spot start to allow Matt Harvey, Jacob deGrom and Bartolo Colon to rest, Montero, once considered a top prospect, gave up three runs in five and two-thirds innings.
